silver.name: AFK
silver.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

silver.name: All Natural I
silver.desc: Your Champions with no items equipped gain 120 Health and heal for 1% of their max Health each second.

silver.name: Juggernaut Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Juggernaut. Gain a Sett.

silver.name: Army Building
silver.desc: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. This happens a second time after 7 player combats.

silver.name: Balanced Budget
silver.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 4 Gold.

silver.name: Caretaker's Ally
silver.desc: Each time you level up, gain the same random Tier 2 champion.

silver.name: Bastion Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bastion. Gain a Kassadin.

silver.name: Battle Ready
silver.desc: Your team deals 3% more damage and takes 3% less damage.

silver.name: Blood Money
silver.desc: Gain 1 gold per 3 Health your Tactician loses.

silver.name: Branching Out
silver.desc: Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

silver.name: Bronze Ticket
silver.desc: Every 4 Shop refreshes, gain a free refresh.

silver.name: Bruiser Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bruiser. Gain a Vi.

silver.name: Buried Treasures I
silver.desc: At the start of the next 2 rounds, gain a random item component.

silver.name: Challenger Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Challenger. Gain a Warwick.

silver.name: Knowledge Download I
silver.desc: Gain 12 XP.

silver.name: Money!
silver.desc: Gain 11 Gold. In 4 turns, gain 11 Gold again.

silver.name: Partial Ascension
silver.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.

silver.name: Rolling For Days I
silver.desc: Gain 10 free shop refreshes. These shop refreshes carry over between rounds.

silver.name: Small Forge
silver.desc: Gain a Component Anvil and 2 Gold.

silver.name: Job's Done
silver.desc: Gain a Component Anvil and a random Component Item.

silver.name: Tiny Power I
silver.desc: Your units gain 6% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.

silver.name: Well-Earned Comforts I
silver.desc: Your units gain 70 Health for each item equipped.

silver.name: Consistency
silver.desc: Gain double win and loss streak gold.

silver.name: Component Buffet
silver.desc: Gain a random component. Whenever you would get a random component, instead gain a component anvil.

silver.name: Cutting Corners
silver.desc: Leveling up costs 3 XP less. You can now reach Level 10.

silver.name: Cybernetic Bulk I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 225 health.

silver.name: Cybernetic Leech I
silver.desc: Your units holding an item gain 80 Health and 10% Omnivamp.

silver.name: Spoils of War I
silver.desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 20% chance to drop loot.

silver.name: Final Grab Bag
silver.desc: Gain a random component, 12 gold, and a Reforger.

silver.name: Unified Resistance I
silver.desc: If you have 3 or more units in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.

silver.name: Gotta Go Fast!
silver.desc: Your team generates 10% more mana and moves 35% faster.

silver.name: Harmacist I
silver.desc: Your units heal for 10% of the damage they deal, and they convert 20% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

silver.name: Healing Orbs I
silver.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest allied unit is healed for 250.

silver.name: Inconsistency
silver.desc: If your streak is less than 3, gain 2 gold.

silver.name: Indomitable Will
silver.desc: When your units score a Takedown they shed all negative effects and become immune to Crowd Control for 10 seconds.

silver.name: Iron Assets
silver.desc: Gain a Component Anvil and 4 Gold.

silver.name: Item Grab Bag I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

silver.name: It Pays To Learn
silver.desc: Gain 10 XP and 8 gold.

silver.name: Lategame Specialist
silver.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 44 gold.

silver.name: Jeweled Lotus I
silver.desc: Combat Start: Your strongest unit gains 40% critical strike chance and their spells can critically strike.

silver.name: Latent Forge
silver.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil after 8 player combats.

silver.name: Gunner Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Gunner. Gain a Jinx.

silver.name: Missed Connections
silver.desc: Gain a copy of each Tier One champion.

silver.name: On a Roll
silver.desc: Whenever you star-up a champion, gain a free reroll. Gain 2 gold.

silver.name: One, Two, Five!
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 Gold, and 1 random Tier 5 champion(s).

silver.name: One Twos Three
silver.desc: Gain 1 Tier one unit, 2 Tier two units, and 1 Tier three unit.

silver.name: Pandora's Bench
silver.desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

silver.name: Pandora's Items
silver.desc: Gain a random component. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

silver.name: Invoker Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Invoker. Gain a Soraka.

silver.name: Pumping Up I
silver.desc: Your units gain 8% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 0.5%.

silver.name: Recombobulator
silver.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 Tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

silver.name: Red Buff
silver.desc: Your units' attacks burn their targets for 5% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds and reduce their targets' healing received by 50%.

silver.name: Risky Moves
silver.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 Player combats, gain 30 Gold.

silver.name: Rogue Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Rogue. Gain a Qiyana.

silver.name: Silver Spoon
silver.desc: Gain 10 XP.

silver.name: Slayer Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Slayer. Gain a Qiyana.

silver.name: Social Distancing I
silver.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 10% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

silver.name: Sorcerer Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sorcerer. Gain a Swain.

silver.name: Tiny Grab Bag
silver.desc: Gain a random component, 2 gold, a Magnetic Remover.

silver.name: Tiny Titans
silver.desc: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and has 130 maximum Health.

silver.name: Training Reward
silver.desc: Gain 5 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

silver.name: Transfusion I
silver.desc: Your team gains 20 Health, plus 2 Health per missing Tactician Health.

silver.name: Young and Wild and Free
silver.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain a random component.

silver.name: Zaun Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Zaun. Gain a Warwick.

silver.name: Vanquisher Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Vanquisher. Gain an Ashe.

silver.name: Stationary Support I
silver.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy(s) after 8 player combats. Equip the dummy with 1 random Support Item(s), which cannot be removed.

silver.name: Teaming Up I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component item and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

gold.name: A Cut Above
gold.desc: Gain a Deathblade. Champions with Deathblade have a 25% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.

gold.name: All Natural II
gold.desc: Your units with no items equipped gain 150 Health and heal for 2% of their max Health each second.

gold.name: Juggernaut Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Juggernaut Emblem and a Sett.

gold.name: Balanced Budget II
gold.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 6 Gold.

gold.name: Caretaker's Favor
gold.desc: Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

gold.name: Bastion Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem and a Kassadin.

gold.name: Morning Light
gold.desc: When your Bastion units drop below 50% Health, they heal for 40% of their maximum Health over 4 seconds. Gain 2 Bastion units.

gold.name: Battle Ready II
gold.desc: Your team deals 6% more damage and takes 6% less damage.

gold.name: Big Grab Bag
gold.desc: Gain 2 random components, 1 gold, and a Reforger.

gold.name: Bruiser Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Vi.

gold.name: Titanic Strength
gold.desc: Bruisers gain % increased Attack Damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health. Gain 2 Bruisers.

gold.name: Buried Treasures II
gold.desc: At the start of the next 3 rounds, gain a random item component.

gold.name: Capricious Forge
gold.desc: Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two temporary Artifacts each round.

gold.name: Challenger Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Challenger Emblem and a Warwick.

gold.name: Defensive Dash
gold.desc: Combat Start and on takedown: Your Challenger units gain a 100-250 health shield for 2.5 seconds (based on current Stage). Gain 2 Challenger units.

gold.name: Combat Caster
gold.desc: Your units gain a 90-170 (based on current Stage) health shield for 6 seconds after casting their spell.

gold.name: Ascension
gold.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

gold.name: Knowledge Download II
gold.desc: Gain 22 XP.

gold.name: Medium Forge
gold.desc: Gain a Completed Item Anvil and 1 Gold.

gold.name: Job Well Done
gold.desc: Gain a Completed Item Anvil and a random Component item.

gold.name: Money Money!
gold.desc: Gain 16 Gold. In 3 turns, gain 16 Gold again.

gold.name: Rolling For Days II
gold.desc: Gain 15 free shop refreshes, These shop refreshes carry over between rounds.

gold.name: Tiny Power II
gold.desc: Your units gains 10% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.

gold.name: Well-Earned Comforts II
gold.desc: Your units gain 111 Health for each item equipped.

gold.name: Contagion
gold.desc: Combat Start: Infect the highest health enemy, increasing their damage taken by 18%. Every 5 seconds or on death, the infection spreads to 2 nearby units.

gold.name: Cybernetic Bulk II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.

gold.name: Cybernetic Leech II
gold.desc: Your units holding an item gain 120 Health and 15% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Parting Gifts
gold.desc: When a unit dies, they pass a temporary copy of one of their items to the nearest ally with open slots and shield them for 50% of their maximum Health.

gold.name: Dedication
gold.desc: The first time you field at least 4 distinct units of the same trait in a player combat, gain an Emblem for that trait.

gold.name: Demacia Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Demacia Emblem and a Galio.

gold.name: Petricite Shackles
gold.desc: Your Demacians deal 12% more damage, increased to 18% against Noxians and enemies with 100 or more maximum Mana. Gain 2 Demacians.

gold.name: Spoils of War II
gold.desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 30% chance to drop loot.

gold.name: Early Education
gold.desc: Your champions permanently gain 1 Ability Power whenever they kill an enemy. Champions start with 15 bonus Ability Power.

gold.name: Endurance Training
gold.desc: Your champions permanently gain 18 Health every time they kill an enemy. Champions start with 100 bonus Health.

gold.name: Mana Burn
gold.desc: Gain a Shroud of Stillness. All enemies take 1.5% of their maximum health as true damage each second until the first time they cast their spell. No longer damages units without mana.

gold.name: Escort Quest
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. Each round, if it survives combat, gain 3 gold.

gold.name: Final Grab Bag II
gold.desc: Gain 2 random components, 15 gold, and a Magentic Remover.

gold.name: Unified Resistance II
gold.desc: If you have 3 or more units in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

gold.name: Freljord Heart
gold.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Freljord. Gain an Ashe.

gold.name: Winds of War
gold.desc: Gain a Galio. Your strongest Galio's ability gets larger with each cast, and enemies hit take magic damage equal to 10% of his max Health each second.

gold.name: Gargantuan Resolve
gold.desc: Gain a Titan's Resolve. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 40 instead of 25.

gold.name: Gifts from the Fallen
gold.desc: Your units gain 3% Attack Damage, 3 Ability Power, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist. When one of your units dies, all your units gain these stats again.

gold.name: Gotta Go Fast! II
gold.desc: Your team generates 20% more mana and moves 60% faster.

gold.name: Dueling Gunners
gold.desc: Your Gunner units gain 8% Attack Speed, plus 2% per Gunner stack. Gain 2 Gunners.

gold.name: Harmacist II
gold.desc: Your units heal for 15% of the damage they deal, and they convert 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

gold.name: Healing Orbs II
gold.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest allied unit is healed for 500.

gold.name: Hustler
gold.desc: Instead of having no interest, you get 3 golds at the beginning of player combat rounds.

gold.name: Idealism
gold.desc: Gain a Hand of Justice. Champions with a Hand of Justice deal 12% increased damage.

gold.name: Scrappy Inventions
gold.desc: At the start of combat, maximum of 4 components on your champions turn into  temporary items for the rest of combat. At the start of the next 1 stages, gain a component.

gold.name: Infusion
gold.desc: Your team restores 20 Mana every 6 seconds.

gold.name: Loving Invocation
gold.desc: Your team gains 2 Ability Power until the end of combat each time your Invoker units cast their Abilities. Gain 2 Invokers.

gold.name: Ionia Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Ionia Emblem and a Sett.

gold.name: Sentinel's Spirit
gold.desc: While in spirit form, your Ionia units gain 10% Attack Speed and shield themselves for 15% of their maximum Health. Gain 2 Ionians.

gold.name: Item Grab Bag II
gold.desc: Gain a random completed item, a random component, and 1 gold.

gold.name: It Pays to Learn II
gold.desc: Gain 16 XP and 12 gold.

gold.name: Jeweled Lotus II
gold.desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 15% Critical Strike chance.

gold.name: Adrenaline Rush
gold.desc: Your Juggernaut units deal 10% extra damage, increased to 20% for the rest of combat when they fall below 60% Health.  Gain 2 Juggernauts.

gold.name: Frequent Flier
gold.desc: After you refresh your shop 8 times, your refreshes cost 1 for the rest of the game.

gold.name: Riftwalk
gold.desc: Before casting, your strongest Kassadin gains 38 AP and blinks to the furthest enemy within 3 hexes, but his spell no longer disarms or shields. His mana cost is reduced by 30. Gain a Kassadin.

gold.name: Library Card
gold.desc: Gain a Tome of Traits and a Component Anvil

gold.name: Know Your Enemy
gold.desc: Your units deal 12% increased damage. If you and your opponent have any of the same traits activated, they deal 18% increased damage instead.

gold.name: Last Stand
gold.desc: The first time you would be eliminated or reduced to 1 Health, instead remain alive. After this effect triggers, your units permanently gain 180 Health, 18 Armor and Magic Resist, and 18% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Patient Study
gold.desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost. You can now reach Level 10.

gold.name: Long Distance Pals II
gold.desc: Combat start: Your two furthest champions form a bond, sharing 22% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

gold.name: Gunner Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Gunner Emblem and a Jinx.

gold.name: Martyr
gold.desc: Whenever one of your units dies, all allies heal for 10% of Maximum health

gold.name: Metabolic Accelerator
gold.desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PvP round.

gold.name: Perfected Repetition
gold.desc: Each time your Multicaster units deal ability damage, they gain 9%% Ability power (Max: 90%%) until the end of combat. Gain 2 Multicasters.

gold.name: Not Today
gold.desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Allies holding Edge of Night gain 35% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Noxus Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Noxus Emblem and a Swain.

gold.name: Total Domination
gold.desc: Noxus units' attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 5% Health, increased by 1% for each player you've Conquered. Gain 2 Noxians.

gold.name: Magic Wand
gold.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18% Ability Power.

gold.name: Pandora's Items II
gold.desc: Gain 1 random components. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

gold.name: Shimmering Inventors
gold.desc: Your Piltover units gain 8% Bonus Damage every 10 gold you have (Max: 40%), and have a 33% chance to drop 1 gold at round start. Gain an Ekko.

gold.name: Piltover Heart
gold.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Piltover. Gain a Vi.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 2 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 4 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

gold.name: Invoker Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Invoker Emblem and a Soraka.

gold.name: Pumping Up II
gold.desc: Your units gain 8% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 1%.

gold.name: Return on Investment
gold.desc: After you refresh your shop 18 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.

gold.name: Rich Get Richer
gold.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

gold.name: Rich Get Richer+
gold.desc: Gain 18 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

gold.name: Rogue Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Rogue Emblem and a Qiyana.

gold.name: Vampiric Blades
gold.desc: Your team gains 10% Omnivamp. Your Rogue units gain 15% instead. Gain 2 Rogues.

gold.name: Salvage Bin
gold.desc: Gain a random completed item now, and a component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

gold.name: Salvage Bin+
gold.desc: Gain a random completed item now, and a component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

gold.name: The Boss
gold.desc: Gain a Sett. The first time your strongest Sett falls below 60% Health, he takes a break to do sit-ups. Each sit-up heals him 10% of his max Health and grants 40% Attack Speed and Ability Power.

gold.name: Shoplifting
gold.desc: After your first shop refresh each turn, gain the highest cost champion for free.

gold.name: Shurima Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Shurima Emblem and a Taliyah.

gold.name: Silver Ticket
gold.desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 30% chance to gain a free refresh.

gold.name: Slayer Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Slayer Emblem and a Qiyana.

gold.name: Slayer's Resolve
gold.desc: When your Slayer units take or deal damage, they gain 2 Armor and Magic Resistance for the rest of combat (This can stack up to 25 times). Gain 2 Slayers.

gold.name: Sleight of Hand
gold.desc: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding Thief's Gloves gain 200 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Social Distancing II
gold.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 16% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

gold.name: Sorcerer Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem and a Swain.

gold.name: Overcharged Manafont
gold.desc: Combat Start: Your Sorcerer units gain 10 mana. The first time each Sorcerer gets a take down each combat, they gain 20 mana. Gain 2 Sorcerers.

gold.name: Stars are Born
gold.desc: The first tier 1 unit and tier 2 unit you buy are upgraded to 2-star. Gain a 3 gold.

gold.name: Tactical Superiority
gold.desc: Your units gain 4% Attack Damage and Ability Power for each of their traits you have activated, doubled when you field a Strategist. Gain 2 Strategists.

gold.name: Strategist Heart
gold.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Strategist. Gain a Swain.

gold.name: Demonflare
gold.desc: Gain a Swain. Your strongest Swain deals 2.5% increased damage per 100 max Health.

gold.name: Stellacorn's Blessing
gold.desc: While you have the Targon trait activated, your units gain 40% Attack Speed for 4 seconds after being healed or shielded. Gain 2 Targonians.

gold.name: Targon Heart
gold.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Targon. Gain a Soraka.

gold.name: Three's a Crowd
gold.desc: Your units gain 100 Health for each unique Tier 3 unit you field.

gold.name: Three's Company
gold.desc: Gain 4 random Tier 3 champions.

gold.name: Ancient Archives I
gold.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 3 gold.

gold.name: Tons of Stats!
gold.desc: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

gold.name: Training Reward II
gold.desc: Gain 12 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

gold.name: Trade Sector
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

gold.name: Built Different II
gold.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 250-500 Health and 40-60% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

gold.name: Transfusion II
gold.desc: Your team gains 40 Health, plus 3 Health per missing Tactician Health.

gold.name: Double Trouble II
gold.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 30% Attack Damage and 30 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

gold.name: Two Healthy
gold.desc: Your units gain 100 Health for each unique Tier 2 unit you field.

gold.name: Stable Evolution
gold.desc: Your Void units gain 60 Health and 6% Attack Damage and Ability Power for each star level they have. Gain 2 Void units.

gold.name: Void Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Void Emblem, Kassadin.

gold.name: Ravenous Hunter
gold.desc: Gain a Warwick. When your strongest Warwick takes or deals damage, he gains 4% Attack Damage and 4 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist, stacking up to 55 times.

gold.name: What Doesn't Kill You
gold.desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold. Every 4 losses, gain a random component.

gold.name: You Have My Bow
gold.desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.

gold.name: You Have My Sword
gold.desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.

gold.name: Chemtech Enhancements
gold.desc: Your Chem Modded units gain 500 Health. Allies that start combat adjacent to them gain 250 Health. Gain 2 Zaun units.

gold.name: Zaun Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Zaun Emblem and a Warwick.

gold.name: Bilgewater Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Bilgewater Emblem and a Twisted Fate.

gold.name: Ixtal Heart
gold.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ixtal. Gain a Qiyana.

gold.name: Vanquisher Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Vanquisher Emblem and an Ashe.

gold.name: Rising Infamy
gold.desc: Round start: Get a level 1 treasure chest. Your cannon barrages permanently improve future chests. Gain 2 Bilgewater units.

gold.name: Rising Infamy+
gold.desc: Round start: Get a level 2 treasure chest. Your cannon barrages permanently improve future chests. Gain 2 Bilgewater units.

gold.name: Rising Infamy++
gold.desc: Round start: Get a level 4 treasure chest. Your cannon barrages permanently improve future chests. Gain 2 Bilgewater units.

gold.name: Rejuvenating Flames
gold.desc: Allies heal for 10% of their max Health every 5 seconds. Allies that started combat in an elemental hex heal for 15% instead. Gain 2 Ixtal champions.

gold.name: Stolen Vitality
gold.desc: When your Vanquisher's attacks and Abilities critically strike, they heal the ally with the most missing Health by 1% of that ally's max Health. Gain 2 Vanquishers.

gold.name: Stationary Support II
gold.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy(s). It has 1 random Support Item(s) equipped, which cannot be removed.

gold.name: Support Cache
gold.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 4 unique Support items.

gold.name: Teaming Up II
gold.desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 1 random Tier 4 champion.

prismatic.desc: Gain an Juggernaut Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Darius.

prismatic.name: Balanced Budget III
prismatic.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 10 Gold.

prismatic.name: Caretaker's Chosen
prismatic.desc: As you level, gain more powerful items. At level 4 - gain a Component Anvil, at level 6 - gain a Completed Item Anvil, at level 8 - open a radiant item armory.

prismatic.name: Bastion Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem,  a Sunfire Cape, and a Taric.

prismatic.name: Battle Ready III
prismatic.desc: Your team deals 8% more damage and takes 8% less damage.

prismatic.name: Binary Airdrop
prismatic.desc: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat.

prismatic.name: Birthday Present
prismatic.desc: Gain a 2-star champion and 1 gold every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).

prismatic.name: Blinding Speed
prismatic.desc: Gain a Rapid Firecannon and a Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve bow, a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Bruiser Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Redemption, and a Rek'Sai.

prismatic.desc: At the start of the next 6 rounds, gain a random item component.

prismatic.name: Challenger Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Challenger Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Naafiri.

prismatic.name: Knowledge Download III
prismatic.desc: Gain 36 XP.

prismatic.name: Final Ascension
prismatic.desc: Your units deal 15% more damage. After 15 seconds, this effect triples.

prismatic.name: Large Forge
prismatic.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil and a Component Item Anvil.

prismatic.name: Masterful Job
prismatic.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil and a Completed Item Anvil

prismatic.name: Money Money Money!
prismatic.desc: Gain 25 Gold. In 3 turns, gain 25 Gold again.

prismatic.name: Rolling For Days III
prismatic.desc: Gain 25 free shop refreshes, These shop refreshes carry over between rounds.

prismatic.name: Tiny Power III
prismatic.desc: Your units gains 15% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Well-Earned Comforts III
prismatic.desc: Your units gain 120 Health and 6% Attack Speed for each item equipped.

prismatic.name: Cursed Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain +2 maximum team size, but take 100% increased player damage.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Bulk III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 500 health.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Leech III
prismatic.desc: Your units holding an item gain 250 Health and 20% Omnivamp.

prismatic.name: Demacia Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Demacia Emblem, a Recurve Bow, and a Quinn.

prismatic.name: Spoils of War III
prismatic.desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 40% chance to drop amazing loot.

prismatic.name: Urf's Grab Bag
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 random components, a Champion Duplicator, and a Spatula.

prismatic.name: Final Reserves
prismatic.desc: The first time you would be eliminated or reduced to 1 Health, instead remain alive. Then, at the beginning of your next planning phase gain 60 XP and set your gold to 66. Excess gold is converted to XP.

prismatic.name: Freljord Soul
prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Freljord. Gain a Redemption and an Ashe.

prismatic.name: Golden Ticket
prismatic.desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 45% chance to gain a free refresh.

prismatic.name: Giant Grab Bag
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 random components, 4 gold, and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

prismatic.name: Gotta Go Fast!!! III
prismatic.desc: Your team generates 30% more mana and moves 100% faster.

prismatic.name: Jeweled Lotus III
prismatic.desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 45% Critical Strike chance.

prismatic.name: Harmacist III
prismatic.desc: Your units heal for 25% of the damage they deal, and they convert 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund
prismatic.desc: Gain 23 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 10.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund+
prismatic.desc: Gain 32 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 10.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund++
prismatic.desc: Gain 44 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 10.

prismatic.name: High End Sector
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 gold per round. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over between rounds.

prismatic.name: Impenetrable Bulwark
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest, a Dragon's Claw, a Giant's Belt, and a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Infernal Contract
prismatic.desc: Your max level is 7. Gain 75 Gold.

prismatic.name: Ionia Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Ionia Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and a Karma.

prismatic.name: Item Grab Bag III
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 random full items and 4 Gold.

prismatic.name: It Pays to Learn III
prismatic.desc: Gain 24 XP and 16 gold.

prismatic.name: Living Forge
prismatic.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Gunner Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Gunner Emblem, a Runann's Hurricane, and a Jayce.

prismatic.name: Level Up!
prismatic.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 3. Gain 2 immediately. You can now reach level 10.

prismatic.name: Wellness Trust
prismatic.desc: Round Start: Gain 3 gold. If you have at least 40 gold, your Tactician heals 2 Health.

prismatic.name: Multicaster Soul
prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Multicaster. Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet and a Vel'Koz.

prismatic.name: Noxus Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Noxus Emblem, a Sparring Gloves, and a Darius.

prismatic.name: Endless Hordes
prismatic.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.

prismatic.name: Endless Hordes+
prismatic.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 14 gold.

prismatic.name: Overwhelming Force
prismatic.desc: Gain a Deathblade and an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Pandora's Box
prismatic.desc: Gain a random Radiant item. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday
prismatic.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday+
prismatic.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

prismatic.name: Piltover Soul
prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Piltover. Gain a Giant Slayer and a Jayce.

prismatic.name: Invoker Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Invoker Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Karma.

prismatic.name: Pumping Up III
prismatic.desc: Your units gain 8% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 2%.

prismatic.name: Radiant Relics
prismatic.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 5 unique Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Rogue Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Rogue Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Qiyana.

prismatic.name: Roll The Dice
prismatic.desc: Gain a Rascal's Gloves, which equips two random Radiant items every round.

prismatic.name: Cruel Pact
prismatic.desc: Buying XP costs 5 Health instead of gold. Heal 2 Health before each player combat.

prismatic.name: Shurima Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Shurima Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Naafiri.

prismatic.name: Slayer Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Slayer Emblem, a Night harvester, and a Quinn.

prismatic.name: March of Progress
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

prismatic.name: Social Distancing III
prismatic.desc: Combat start: Units with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Sorcerer Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Vel'Koz.

prismatic.name: Starter Kit
prismatic.desc: Gain a Tier 4 champion, and a 2-star Tier 1 champion that shares a trait with them. At the next 1 stages, gain the Tier 4 champion again.

prismatic.name: Strategist Soul
prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Strategist. Gain a Adaptive Helm and a Swain.

prismatic.name: Tactician's Tools
prismatic.desc: Gain two Spatulas and 1 Component Anvil.

prismatic.name: Targon Soul
prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Targon. Gain a Redemption and a Taric.

prismatic.name: The Golden Egg
prismatic.desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 11 turns. Victorious player combats accelerate the hatch timer by an additional turn.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan
prismatic.desc: Your tactician is small and speedy, heals 2 Health after a PVP round, and grants 2 Gold per round.

prismatic.name: Ancient Archives II
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 5 gold.

prismatic.name: Training Reward III
prismatic.desc: Gain 24 gold and a Champion Duplicator.

prismatic.name: Built Different III
prismatic.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-600 Health and 50-70% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

prismatic.name: Transfusion III
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 50 Health, plus 5 Health per missing Tactician Health.

prismatic.name: Double Trouble III
prismatic.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 40% Attack Damage and 40 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

prismatic.name: Unleashed Arcana
prismatic.desc: Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Void Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Void Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and a Rek'Sai.

prismatic.name: Wandering Trainer
prismatic.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. It has 3 random Emblems equipped, which cannot be removed. Gain 6 gold.

prismatic.name: What The Forge
prismatic.desc: All Completed items you own or receive are reforged into random Ornn Artifacts (excluding Tactician's Crown and Emblems). Units gain 110 Health per equipped Artifact.

prismatic.name: Zaun Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Zaun Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and an Ekko.

prismatic.name: Bilgewater Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bilgewater Emblem, a Night Harvester, and a Nautilus.

prismatic.name: Vanquisher Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Vanquisher Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Darius.

prismatic.name: Stationary Support III
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy(s). It has 3 random Support Items equipped, which cannot be removed.

prismatic.name: Teaming Up III
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 Support Anvil, 1 random component, and 2 random Tier 4 champions.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan+
prismatic.desc: Your tactician is small and speedy, heals 2 Health after a PVP round, and grants 2 Gold per round. And gain 8 golds.
